THIS GAME IS IN PRE-ALPHA
ABOUT THIS GAME

Welcome to a cartoon-style fantasy world full of magic, treachery and all kinds of cloak-and-dagger shenanigans.

Take on the role of Slink, a daring adventurer and prolific thief in his quest to save the world from a dangerous arcane force let loose during a botched job in an ancient temple.

But you won’t be alone in your quest. You’ll be joined (quite literally) by Snatch, a snarky demon gauntlet that somewhat forcibly replaced one of your hands and acts as a grappling hook, granting you the ability to zip around the environment, reach difficult places and occasionally get out of uncomfortable exchanges with the city guard.

Explore freely each nook and cranny of hand crafted, open levels with tons of secrets to discover and other people’s stuff to acquire (don’t worry, they’re all despicable).

An immersive adventure inspired by classic collectathons, with a stealth twist and designed from the ground up for VR.

AGILE, IMMERSIVE AND COMFORTABLE LOCOMOTION
Zip around with the agile grappling mechanics. Sneak around with the smooth locomotion system, with lots of comfort settings (and you can always rely on your grappler if smooth locomotion is not for you).

EXPLORE OPEN, HAND CRAFTED ENVIRONMENTS
Explore open, intricate, hand crafted environments with lots to discover (and steal).

OUTSMART YOUR ENEMIES
Avoiding being seen or heard, and even pickpocket them right under their noses (if your fingers are light enough)
